Addon.name: Login Lightbox

Scripting.Code: function m dim addonId dim username, password, prefix, needLoginBox, email prefix = cp.doc.gettext("ccFormSN") username = cp.doc.gettext(prefix&"username") password = cp.doc.gettext(prefix&"password") email = cp.doc.gettext(prefix&"email") needLoginBox = false if (username = "") then if ( email = "" ) then ' else cp.email.sendPassword( email ) end if needLoginBox = true else if (CP.User.Login(username,password)) then needLoginBox = false else needLoginBox = true end if end if if needLoginBox then addonId = cp.site.getInteger( "LOGIN PAGE ADDONID" ) if addonId=0 then m = ccLib.getLoginForm() else m = cp.utils.executeAddon( addonId ) end if end if end function
function m call cp.user.logout() call cp.response.redirect("?") end function
